sentence.Network_cn: 要是她不领情,我就再也不给她了.

entry.tran: 不感激的；不领情的；忘恩负义的
entry.def: If you describe someone as ungrateful, you are criticizing them for not showing thanks or for being unkind to someone who has helped them or done them a favour.

example.ex: I thought it was rather ungrateful...
example.tran: 我觉得这样做有些忘恩负义。
你这个没良心的小坏蛋。

sentences.sentence: "How sharper than a serpent's tooth it is / To have a thankless child!"- Shakespeare
"I will not perform the ungrateful task of comparing cases of failure"- Abraham Lincoln

auth_sentence.content: He was cold, aloof, condescending, ungrateful.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was cold, aloof, condescending, ungrateful.

auth_sentence.content: Ya ungrateful bam! I just saved your poxy life!
auth_sentence.res_content: Ya ungrateful bam! I just saved your poxy life!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ya ungrateful bam! I just saved your poxy life!

auth_sentence.content: I said hurriedly, not wanting to offend anybody or seem ungrateful.
auth_sentence.res_content: I said hurriedly, not wanting to offend anybody or seem ungrateful.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I said hurriedly, not wanting to offend anybody or seem ungrateful.

sentences.cn: 要是她不领情,我就再也不给她了。

sentences.en: I can’t believe he didn’t even say thank you.
sentences.cn: How ungrateful can you get?他甚至连谢谢都没说,真让人难以相信。一个人怎么可能这么忘恩负义呢?
一项吃力不讨好的任务
